text: aur agar tum un auraton ka mehar to muayyan kar chuke ho magar haath lagaane ke qabl hee talaaq de do to un auraton ko mehar muayyan ka aadha de do magar ye ki ye auraten khud maaph kar den ya un ka valee jisake haath mein unake nikaah ka ekhteyaar ho maaf kar de (tab kuchh nahee) aur agar tum hee saara mehar bakhsh do to parahezagaaree se bahut hee qareeb hai aur aapas kee burzugee to mat bhoolo aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda zarur dekh raha hai
